languages.text: "Противников Тисифоны всегда было много, но мы боялись открыться друг другу — кто-то из нас мог быть шпионом ее последователей. Мы копили силы и нанесли первый удар спустя пять лет с рождения наследницы — по одному из поместий на планете Ир-Т-Ви. Но девчонка выжила, а регент Ааронто запрятал ее так далеко и охранял так чутко, что нам потребовалось тринадцать лет на поиски".

traits.locale_text: "Противников Тисифоны всегда было много, но мы боялись открыться друг другу — кто-то из нас мог быть шпионом ее последователей. Мы копили силы и нанесли первый удар спустя пять лет с рождения наследницы — по одному из поместий на планете Ир-Витри. Но девчонка выжила, а регент Ааронто запрятал ее так далеко и охранял так чутко, что нам потребовалось тринадцать лет на поиски".
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."
languages.original_text: "Противников Тисифоны всегда было много, но мы боялись открыться друг другу — кто-то из нас мог быть шпионом ее последователей. Мы копили силы и нанесли первый удар спустя пять лет с рождения наследницы — по одному из поместий на планете Ир-Т-Ви. Но девчонка выжила, а регент Ааронто запрятал ее так далеко и охранял так чутко, что нам потребовалось тринадцать лет на поиски".

We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-Vitri. But the girl survived, and regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “提西福涅有很多敌人，但我们不敢信任彼此。我们之中任何一个人，都有可能是她的追随者安插的内应。我们积蓄力量，在继承人诞生的五年之后发起了第一场袭击。我们袭击了伊维特里的庄园，但那个女孩却幸免于难。之后，阿伦托摄政王把她藏到了很远的地方，看守得非常严密。我们又花了十三年的时间，才终于找到她。”
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."

traits.locale_text: “提西福涅有很多敌人，但我们不敢信任彼此。我们之中任何一个人，都有可能是她的追随者安插的内应。我们积蓄力量，在继承人诞生的五年之后发起了第一场袭击。我们袭击了伊维特里的庄园，但那个女孩却幸免于难。之后，阿伦托摄政王把她藏到了很远的地方，看守得非常严密。我们又花了十三年的时间，才终于找到她。”
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «A Tisiphone le sobraban los enemigos, pero nunca nos atrevíamos a confiar los unos en los otros. Cualquiera podría ser un espía de sus seguidores. Conservamos nuestras fuerzas y asestamos el primer golpe cinco años después de que naciera la heredera. Atacamos una de las fincas en Ir-T-Vi. Sin embargo, la chica sobrevivió y el regente Aaronto la escondió tan lejos y con tanta vigilancia que tardamos trece años más en encontrarla de nuevo».
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."

traits.locale_text: «A Tisiphone le sobraban los enemigos, pero nunca nos atrevíamos a confiar los unos en los otros. Cualquiera podría ser un espía de sus seguidores. Conservamos nuestras fuerzas y asestamos el primer golpe cinco años después de que naciera la heredera. Atacamos una de las fincas en Ir-Vitri. Sin embargo, la chica sobrevivió y el regente Aaronto la escondió tan lejos y con tanta vigilancia que tardamos trece años más en encontrarla de nuevo».
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「ティシフォンは常に多くの敵対者を抱えていたが、私たちは互いを信用することを恐れていた…私たちの誰かが、彼女の支持者のためにスパイをしているかもしれなかったから。私たちは力を蓄え、世継ぎが生まれた5年後に、イル・ト・ヴィの邸宅で最初の一撃を加えた。しかし少女は生き延びた。そして摂政アーロントは彼女を遠くへ隠し、徹底的に警護したため、彼女を見つけるまでにさらに13年かかった」
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."

traits.locale_text: 「ティシフォンは常に多くの敵対者を抱えていたが、私たちは互いを信用することを恐れていた…私たちの誰かが、彼女の支持者のためにスパイをしているかもしれなかったから。私たちは力を蓄え、世継ぎが生まれた5年後に、イル・ト・ヴィの邸宅で最初の一撃を加えた。しかし少女は生き延びた。そして摂政アーロントは彼女を遠くへ隠し、徹底的に警護したため、彼女を見つけるまでにさらに13年かかった」
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Tisiphone hatte stets zahlreiche Gegner, aber wir hatten Angst, einander zu vertrauen – jeder von uns hätte für ihre Anhänger spionieren können. Wir sparten unsere Kräfte auf und führten den ersten Schlag fünf Jahre nach der Geburt der Erbin aus, mit einem Angriff auf eines der Anwesen auf Ir-T-Vi. Aber das Mädchen überlebte, und Regent Aaronto versteckte sie so weit entfernt und so sicher, dass wir weitere dreizehn Jahre benötigten, um sie zu finden."
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone hatte stets zahlreiche Gegner, aber wir hatten Angst, einander zu vertrauen – jeder von uns hätte für ihre Anhänger spionieren können. Wir sparten unsere Kräfte auf und führten den ersten Schlag fünf Jahre nach der Geburt der Erbin aus, mit einem Angriff auf eines der Anwesen auf Ir-Vitri. Aber das Mädchen überlebte, und Regent Aaronto versteckte sie so weit entfernt und so sicher, dass wir weitere dreizehn Jahre benötigten, um sie zu finden."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Tisiphone a toujours eu bon nombre de détracteurs, mais nous étions incapables de nous faire confiance. Après tout, n'importe lequel d'entre nous aurait pu être un espion à la solde de ses sbires. Nous avons donc économisé nos forces et frappé une première fois cinq ans après la naissance de l'héritière, sur le domaine d'Ir-T-Vi. Malheureusement, l'enfant survécut à l'attaque, suite à quoi le régent Aaronto l'envoya si loin et sous si bonne garde qu'il nous fallut pas moins de treize ans pour la retrouver. »
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."

traits.locale_text: « Tisiphone a toujours eu bon nombre de détracteurs, mais nous étions incapables de nous faire confiance. Après tout, n'importe lequel d'entre nous aurait pu être un espion à la solde de ses sbires. Nous avons donc économisé nos forces et frappé une première fois cinq ans après la naissance de l'héritière, sur le domaine d'Ir-Vitri. Malheureusement, l'enfant survécut à l'attaque, suite à quoi le régent Aaronto l'envoya si loin et sous si bonne garde qu'il nous fallut pas moins de treize ans pour la retrouver. »
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Tisiphone'ye karşı olan birileri her daim vardı ama birbirimize güvenmekten bile korkuyorduk. İçimizden birisi, onun takipçilerinin casusu olabilirdi. Gücümüzü koruduk ve vârisin doğuşunun beşinci yılında Ir-T-Vi mülklerinden birine saldırarak ilk darbemizi vurduk. Ancak kız kurtuldu, ardından Naip Aaronto onu o kadar uzağa gizledi ve o kadar dikkatli korudu ki yeniden bulabilmemiz on üç yıl sürdü."
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone always had plenty of opponents, but we were afraid to trust one another — any of us could be spying for her followers. We saved our strength and dealt the first blow five years after the heir was born, striking at one of the estates on Ir-T-Vi. But the girl survived, and Regent Aaronto hid her so far away and guarded so thoroughly it took us another thirteen years to find her."

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone'ye karşı olan her zaman çok kişi vardı ama birbirimize güvenmekten bile korkuyorduk, içimizden herhangi biri onun takipçilerinin casusu olabilirdi. Gücümüzü koruduk ve ilk darbemizi, vârisin doğuşunun beşinci yılında Ir-T-Vi mülklerinden birine saldırarak vurduk ancak kız hayatta kaldı. Ardından Naip Aaronto onu o kadar uzağa gizledi ve o kadar dikkatli korudu ki yeniden bulabilmemiz on üç yıl daha aldı."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader
